results.title: The Flaming mountain = Huo yan shan
results.creator_credit: Huang En and Changchun Film Studio
results.brief_description:
This is a theatrical rendition of a chapter from the classic Ming novel ‘Journey to the West’. Singing rendered excerpts from the original text in the tradition of Beijing Opera, the film recounts the tribulations of a fiery mountain pass, and the cunning and hardships undergone to disperse the raging flames, so the fellowship may advance on their quest.
The group arrives at a mountain where the rocks are so hot you can cook a meal off of them. The Western pass is covered in fire for over 800 Li, and even the wild beasts dare not enter by that way. By and by, it is revealed to them, of an old man, that this mountain is under the dominion of a forlorn spirit queen, who has been discarded by her husband all alone in the depths of the Bajiao Caves (芭蕉洞). The fiery passage up ahead can be cleared only by the magical fan in her possession. They travel to seek an audience with the lady of the caves, Luosha, who sings of her tale; destitute from the loss of her husband and the lonesome existance she is forced to live out in the cold depths of the earth. After entreating her for use of the fan they discover she is reluctant to part with it, and the inevitable battle commences. Monkey and Luosha fight and she blows him away with the fan.
Monkey regains consciousness outside a temple, whose abbott receives him graciously. After Monkey explains his predicament, the Abbott offers him a magic ball to help him convince Luosha to lend him the fan. Meanwhile, Queen Luosha plans on using the fan again to blow Wukong away forever. Wukong infiltrates her stomach, forcing her to give up the fan. But when Wukong and Pigsy try to disperse the flames, the fan only seems to increase them. It’s not long before they realise their prized fan is a fake. Wukong goes to find the king who left her to beg his favor, but they fight when the King accuses Monkey of killing his son (which he did).
Monkey is instead forced to duplicate himself and present himself to Luosha as her long-lost husband, returned at last to see her. He makes off with the fan, but in turn is tricked out of the fan by the real king. Monkey and Pigsy return to the cave to battle it out with the King, Queen and their minions. This disturbs the mountain dragon, who comes out to fight them. All ends well, however, with the flames being dispersed and the party continuing its journey.

Cultural History of the Film:

The acrobatics are highly impressive.
High production values for the time.
Still retains a very potent theatrical style.
Some beautiful mountainous landscapes.
(3 stars - James Donald; June 10, 2011)

results.title: The Flame that freezes
results.brief_description: The manufacture of Electrolux absorption-type refrigerators in the company’s Melbourne factory. Compares old methods of food preservation with those using refrigeration principles. Shows the manufacture of the freezing unit and explains how it operates. Diagrams explain the operation of refrigerators using gas, kerosene and electricity. Summarises the uses of refrigeration in medical services in both city and country.

results.title: The FJ Holden
results.creator_credit: Michael Thornhill, F J Films Ltd and Edgecliff Films
results.brief_description: Kevin is an apprentice motor mechanic in the western suburbs of Sydney, who, with his mate Bob, spends all his spare time drinking and cruising around the streets in his canary yellow FJ Holden, looking for girls. Derived from a series of comic poems by Terry Larsen, Thornhill’s adaptation replaced the humour with an austere and grim description of a conformist society.

results.title: The Five men of Velish: a document from the peoples war in Russia
results.brief_description: A British Ministry of Information propaganda short comprised of silent documentary footage of Russian civilians gearing up to fight Nazi invaders, accompanied by patriotic British narration and rousing orchestral score. The chilling centrepiece is a series of still photographs taken by a German soldier of the execution of five Russian villagers from the town of Velish.

results.title: The Five faces of Kadarwati = Kadarwati
results.creator_credit: Sophan Sophiaan, J. Adisubrata and Gramedia Film
results.brief_description: A melodrama about the oppression of women during the Japanese occupation in Southeast Asia. Leaving for Singapore thinking she is being sent to medical school by the Japanese, Kadarwati arrives only to find she has been picked to serve the Japanese soldiers stationed there. When she finally meets a Japanese officer who is kind to her and with whom she falls in love, he leaves her behind by committing harakiri. After being subject to abuses and torture by Japanese soldiers, she is brought back home to Java where she plots revenge - changing her name and becoming a prostitute at Japanese headquarters. Directed by Sophan Sophiaan, who became a politician and member of Megawati Sukarnoputri’s PDI-P. In Indonesian with English subtitles.

results.title: The Five Chinese brothers
results.creator_credit: Morton Schindel and Weston Woods Studios
results.brief_description: Once upon a time there were five identical Chinese brothers. The first brother could swallow the sea, the second had an iron neck. The third brother could stretch his legs, the fourth could not be burned and the fifth Chinese brother could hold his breath indefinitely. This amusing riddle tells how the five brothers outwit the townspeople and save themselves from a tragic end.

results.title: The Fishermen of Quintay
results.brief_description: The Chilean Government’s decision that life in the isolated fishing villages must be improved brought two visitors - a Chilean Inspector of Fisheries and a UN Fisheries expert to the village of Quintay. The people of this community were anxious for progress, but they could do little to help due to poverty. The UN expert suggested that the fishermen form a co-operative for selling their fish and buying supplies. As a result life in this remote Chilean village has been raised to a new level.
